version_description:
- New! Added option to show structure of table, view and index
- New! Added Copy functionality to copy table row data on long hold
- New! Added single entry update on single tap over table row entry
- New! Added navigation option to jump at any page of table
- New! Ability to delete table, index and view using swipe
- New! Added option to export database.
- Many improvements and fixes

- New! Added navigation option to jump at any page of table

- New! Added option to export database.
- Many improvements and fixes

New!
• iOS 11 Compatibility
• Updated Dropbox framework to access files from Dropbox

Fixes & Improvements:
• Major bugs fixed for the platform
• Improved performance for the express user-centric experience
